reviewText: Soothing entertainment from the days when television programming was family entertainment.
I've double checked my computer.this song/album is not on my computer. so obviously i'm not happy so what ya gonna do about it?

My memories of the Andy Williams Show were of a later version with his cookie-mooching bear and all his writers and producers doing comedy skits.  Andy Williams is one of a kind, but I was looking for more than just music.
Are recurring comedic skits included on this DVD? I used to love the bits done by the flying Silverman brothers and the cookie bear. If they are on this DVD I'll certainly buy it.
Wish the shows were uncut BUT what you get is GREAT all the same!  ANDY was a master at variety!
I have been waiting for whole episodes of AW show.  This is great.  I wish more of the episodes with Bobby Darin would be released.  Excellent:)
